name: touchportal_messagekeypress
description: Iterate through and keypress a message string

scripts.build-win: pkg --targets node14-win-x64 . && move touchportal_messagekeypress.exe base/Windows/TPMessageKeyPress/ && mkdir base\Windows\TPMessageKeyPress\java && copy node_modules\kbm-robot\java\robot7.jar base\Windows\TPMessageKeyPress\java && del Installers\TPMessageKeyPress-Win.tpp && cd base\Windows && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPMessageKeyPress-Win.tpp TPMessageKeyPress && del TPMessageKeyPress\touchportal_messagekeypress.exe && rmdir /q /s TPMessageKeyPress\java
scripts.build-mac: pkg --targets node14-macos-x64 . && move touchportal_messagekeypress base/Mac/TPMessageKeyPress/ && del Installers\TPMessageKeyPress-Mac.tpp && cd base\Mac && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPMessageKeyPress-Mac.tpp TPMessageKeyPress && del TPMessageKeyPress\touchportal_messagekeypress

author: Jameson Allen aka Spdermn02
